content:
In the village of Maksimivka, the Volnovaksky District Fugasna Aviboma hit the territory of private households where civilians lived.

About thisShe reported March 21State Emergency Service.

Rescuers arrived at the shelling place and immediately started carrying out emergency work, because, according to preliminary information, two people could be held under preliminary information.

The rescue operation lasted for four hours. Rescuers seized the bodies of two dead men from under the rubble.

In total, two people were killed and damaged by 8 private dwellings.

Asreported the armyinform, in Kharkiv, as a result of rocket stroke, 5 people disappeared.
title: In Donetsk, two people were killed because of enemy fire
description: This was reported on March 21 by the State Emergency Service. To the place ...
author: Army Inform
